member.summary:
Registers the built-in pipeline tasks, which are:
Build Builds the project.
Test Executes the project's unit tests.
Deploy Packages and deploys the project.
IntegrationTest Executes the project's integration tests.
CI Runs Build + Test
CICD Runs CI + Deploy
